summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein for transportation charges incurred on March 1, 2004. It details the services provided, the total amount due, and includes shipment details for a package sent on February 18, 2004.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the recipient of the invoice for FedEx services, indicating he utilized their shipping services.

persons.name: Lauren Xwinther
persons.context: Lauren Xwinther is mentioned as the sender of a package associated with the invoice.

persons.name: Joseph Experton
persons.context: Joseph Experton is noted as the individual who signed for the delivery of the package.

events.title: FedEx Shipment
events.description: A package was picked up by FedEx for delivery.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022-6843
keyFacts: The invoice is dated March 1, 2004, and is for FedEx services.
The total amount due on the invoice is $30.56.
The package associated with the invoice was picked up on February 18, 2004, and delivered on February 24, 2004.
The invoice includes a fuel surcharge of $1.48.
The invoice indicates that Jeffrey Epstein saved $50.90 in discounts during this billing period.
